name: ASSBLASTERS
description:
The year is 2242, Earth has been invaded by slug creatures from mars. Humanity's only hope is THE ASSBLASTERS. Equipped with the greatest armour the military can offer (Which is so heavy it makes the wearer unable to move), they propel themselves into battle using a bazooka strapped to their ASS.

Controls:

Click to shoot yourself in the direction of your mouse.

Bump in to enemies to kill them

Try to evade their shots.
